description: Visual toolkit for efficient spreadsheet processing with Excel, CSV, and TSV files. Clean, transform, analyze data without programming.
aggregate-table-data-with-group-by-opera: Aggregate table data with GROUP BY operations or pivot tables. Supports multiple aggregation functions.
columns-to-group-by-for-groupby-mode: Columns to group by (for groupBy mode)
perform-advanced-statistical-analysis-in: Perform advanced statistical analysis including correlation, distribution, outliers detection, and trend analysis.
type-of-statistical-analysis-to-perform: Type of statistical analysis to perform
columns-to-analyze-empty-for-all-numeric: Columns to analyze (empty for all numeric columns)
clean-table-data-by-handling-missing-val: Clean table data by handling missing values, removing duplicates, type conversion, and text normalization.
list-of-cleaning-operations-to-apply: List of cleaning operations to apply
filter-rows-and-columns-based-on-conditi: Filter rows and columns based on conditions. Supports sorting, pagination, and multiple filter operators.
apply-excel-formatting-including-header-: Apply Excel formatting including header styles, column widths, conditional formats, freeze panes and data validation
path-to-the-excel-file-to-format: Path to the Excel file to format
sheet-name-to-format-default-first-sheet: Sheet name to format (default: first sheet)
apply-excel-like-formulas-to-calculate-n: Apply Excel-like formulas to calculate new columns with support for math, logic, text, date and lookup functions
input-table-data-as-array-of-records: Input table data as array of records
quickly-inspect-table-structure-statisti: Quickly inspect table structure, statistics, and data quality. Shows column types, missing values, and sample data.
data-quality-information-only-in-quality: Data quality information (only in quality mode)
join-two-tables-based-on-key-columns-sup: Join two tables based on key columns. Supports inner, left, right, and outer joins similar to SQL.
key-column-s-from-left-table-default-use: Key column(s) from left table (default: use rightKey)
key-column-s-from-right-table-default-us: Key column(s) from right table (default: use leftKey)
whether-to-drop-duplicate-rows-after-joi: Whether to drop duplicate rows after join
number-of-unmatched-rows-from-left-table: Number of unmatched rows from left table
number-of-unmatched-rows-from-right-tabl: Number of unmatched rows from right table
read-excel-csv-or-tsv-files-and-return-s: Read Excel, CSV, or TSV files and return structured data. Supports auto-detection, sheet selection, and large file handling.
file-path-to-read-excel-csv-or-tsv: File path to read (Excel, CSV, or TSV)
excel-sheet-name-to-read-default-first-s: Excel sheet name to read (default: first sheet)
number-of-rows-to-skip-from-the-beginnin: Number of rows to skip from the beginning
maximum-number-of-rows-to-read-for-large: Maximum number of rows to read (for large files)
table-data-as-array-of-records: Table data as array of records
sample-data-using-various-methods-random: Sample data using various methods: random, stratified, systematic, head, or tail sampling.
sample-size-count-if-1-proportion-if-0-s: Sample size (count if >= 1, proportion if 0 < size < 1)
original-data-indices-of-sampled-rows: Original data indices of sampled rows
actual-number-of-rows-in-sample: Actual number of rows in sample
split-table-data-by-ratio-conditions-chu: Split table data by ratio, conditions, chunks, or stratified sampling. Useful for train/test splits.
process-time-series-data-with-resampling: Process time series data with resampling, rolling windows, shift, diff, date parsing and feature extraction operations
input-table-data-as-array-of-records2: Input table data as array of records
transform-table-data-with-operations-lik: Transform table data with operations like adding computed columns, renaming, splitting/merging columns, and type casting.
validate-table-data-against-defined-rule: Validate table data against defined rules including null checks, uniqueness, ranges, patterns, and custom validations.
whether-to-stop-validation-on-first-erro: Whether to stop validation on first error
write-table-data-to-excel-csv-or-tsv-fil: Write table data to Excel, CSV, or TSV files with optional formatting and styling options.
output-format-default-infer-from-file-ex: Output format (default: infer from file extension)
